section.title: DPDK component-options for the openvswitch component
section.para: The following options are supported for use with the openvswitch component:

row.entry: Number of rx queues for each DPDK interface. Refer to the Open vSwitch documentation and the ovs-vswitchd.conf.db man page for details.
